testsuite.name: Team Entity Tests

testcase.name: Parameterized constructor should set name, division, and conference
toString() should contain all team information
Setters and getters should work correctly
toString() should handle null values gracefully
hashCode() should be equal for equal objects
Constructor with ID should set all fields
equals() should return true for teams with same content
equals() should return false for teams with different content
equals() should return false when compared to different type
equals() should return true when object is compared to itself
Should add and delete a team
Default constructor should create empty team
equals() should return false when compared to null
